The Shanxi Guanlingshan Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Lingbeidi, Yangcun Town, Lingchuan County, Jincheng City

operators: Shanxi Lingchuan Chong‘an Guanlingshan Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The facility is operated by Shanxi Lingchuan Chong‘an Guanlingshan Coal Industry Co Ltd.
